title: Prohibits legislature from enacting laws with local government fiscal impact unless fiscal burden is computed and imprinted on bill
summary: Proposes constitutional amendment prohibiting the legislature from enacting any general or special law imposing a direct or indirect burden (fiscal) on any local government unless the cost of same is estimated and appears on the face of the bill; provides that an appropriation shall be made to each local government sufficient to hold it harmless from any part of such fiscal burden.
actClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to article 9 of the constitution, in relation to acts of the legislature having fiscal impact on local governments
